title: Offline Content Access
requirement:
Implement offline listening by enabling downloads for songs, playlists, and podcasts while managing digital rights securely.  
#### Screens:  
* Offline Library: Displays all downloaded items categorized by type (songs, playlists, or podcasts).  
#### Personas:  
* Traveler: Prefers uninterrupted listening without internet or Wi-Fi.  
* Data-Conscious User: Downloads content to avoid excess mobile data usage.
